author: Nanquitas
description: Allows you to dump a process
details:
Allows you to dump a process / Game and produce a *******'s dump header alike. With this it's easier to find cheats / pointer with NTR.  

USE:
Copy the 'plugin' folder onto your SD card 

How to Use:
- A to select a specific region to dump
- B to dump all memory regions
title: NTR-CFW - ProcessDumper2 Plugin
name: ProcessDumper2
